contents.item: God uses His people as instruments for breakthrough
Employment is a vicious cycle
Always celebrate people for who they are
Celebrate God daily by celebrating His creation
We should be blessings to others as believers
Direct your attention to men and find ways to put smiles on their faces
You cannot reach God until you begin to pay attention to humans
Miracles await you when you begin to serve people
Love is about sharing
We bring glory to the Kingdom when we fellowship with one another
Time is the raw material for creation
Life evolved from time
We glorify God when we encourage and bless His creation
When we allow people to fellowship with us, God welcomes us into fellowshipping with Him
Celebrating people is a form of love
You cannot fellowship with God when you disqualify another person from fellowshipping with you
Our fellowship with people brings us closer to the Kingdom
We all have a piece of God in us
We disqualify ourselves from communicating with God when we refuse to open our hearts to people
Serving God is equivalent to serving men
The value of a substance is the product of the time spent to achieve it
Celebrating God in people should be part of our lives as Christians
The best way to appreciate God is to appreciate His creation
The people around you are the instruments that God will use to help you
It is only when you study and understand people that you begin to see God’s principles in them
When you pay attention to man, God also reciprocates with His attention
To help people is to help God
The principle of God is love and honor
All your solutions are in people, and you can only be free when you love them
Our attitude to others dictates God’s attitude to us
Never see yourself as being superior to others
Fellowship with human beings opens up to fellowship with God
We glorify God when we celebrate people’s gifts
No amount of service we do can impress God, only our service to ordinary people can
The proof of your love for God is seen in your service to men
You cannot cherish God without loving people
Appreciate others so that you can be appreciated
Life is about pursuing the essence of creation
You dishonor God when you don’t treat His people with love
Only loving people who love you isn’t profitable
There is always something to appreciate in people
It’s not about who they are, but about God’s principle
An effective life is a fulfilled one
You can only reach God through His creation
The nature of Christ is love
Always ask yourself if you are really serving God
The only way to love God is by loving His people
All humans are important to God, so treat them all with love
We glorify God when we appreciate humans
The way we relate with people is the same way we relate with God
Your solution is in the next person
To celebrate man is to celebrate God
Everyone should be seen as a carrier of God’s nature
We only see God when we see people
The only way to practicalize your love for God is by helping and loving others
Our fellowship is with God and His people
You cannot understand God if you don’t understand people
Your relationship with God is tested by your relationship with His people
God can only relate effectively with you when you relate with people
We glorify God only as we celebrate people
You cannot disregard people and hope to see God
We celebrate God when we share in each other’s joy and pain
God appreciates ordinary people
You can only prove your love to God when you love people that do not deserve your love
Service to God is largely unacceptable without service to men
God is in your neighbor
You only honor and worship God when you do things without expecting anything in return
We are all equal in the sight of the creator
There is no communication with God without communication with God’s people
We cannot glorify God when we refuse to celebrate others
Everyone deserves to be in our fellowship
The ministry of Christ is based on people
God accepts us into His atmosphere when we accept people into our lives
Everything in existence has a purpose
Celebrate and appreciate people that cannot reward you
Never disregard people, regardless of their beliefs, because we all carry God’s likeness
We are only qualified for God’s glory when we glorify people
Love others the way God loves you
Brotherly love should be our number one principle as believers
You cannot discover God without discovering people
The only need of God is in people
The worship of God is in our attitude to people
The purpose of life is fulfilling the essence of your creation
The principle of God is love
When we allow people to come into our environment, God gives us His environment
Our attitude to others dictate God’s attitude to us
God is aware of the hypocrisy in the hearts of men
You cannot receive God when you block people from your life
Our fellowship is with God when we have mutual fellowship with one another
Our fellowship with God cannot be established when we don’t recognize His people
